entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
